game.name: My Taskbar Farm
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 작업 표시줄에서 즐기는 농장 시뮬레이터. 귀여운 농장 동물을 키우며 작업 표시줄에 생명을 불어넣고 다른 일도 병행하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A farm simulator on your taskbar. Bring your taskbar to life by raising adorable farm animals while doing other things.

reviewHighlights.text: Cute little idle incremental game, really liked the adorable pixel animals.
Still needs quite some tweaking, but it has potential.
